guis

Class GameCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • guis.MyCanvas
            • guis.GameCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, Updatable

    public class GameCanvas
extends MyCanvas
implements Updatable
    This is the canvas to display the game elements and state of the game. The user can interact with the game map inside and this canvas will show the results. Every GameCanvas has an inner renderer, a class inherited from Draw.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Methods inherited from interface logic.Updatable

    • Field Detail

      • gameMap

        public GameMap gameMap
        Shown and always updated game map. It contains the Actors on the field and the tiles placed on the map.

      • camera

        private final Camera camera
        The camera follows the player. Clips onto the side of the map when the Player is at the sides.

      • gameClock

        public GameClock gameClock
        Inner clock calls the Updatables' tick() method, which will update all the Actors and things in the game.

      • player

        public Player player
        It spawns on a player spawn and enemies chase it. The user controls the player.

      • pil

        public PlayerInputListener pil
        Takes input from the keyboard from the user. Controls the player.

      • parentFrame

        public GameFrame parentFrame
        The frame which the canvas is on.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCanvas

        public GameCanvas(int width,
                  int height,
                  GameMap gameMap,
                  GameFrame parentFrame)
        Initializes the game map, places Player and starts the timer. Also starts rendering the game map, then refreshes every few milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the canvas in pixels.
        height - the height of the canvas in pixels.
        gameMap - the game map to update and display.
        parentFrame - the frame which this canvas is on.

    • Method Detail

      • setCanvasSize

        public void setCanvasSize(int width,
                          int height)
        Sets the canvas size in pixels.
        Specified by:
        setCanvasSize in class MyCanvas
        Parameters:
        width - the new width in pixels.
        height - the new height in pixels.

      • setUpUpdatables

        private void setUpUpdatables()
        Setting up the actors, placing all Updatables in the GameClock's array to call the tick() method to update them.

      • setUpActors

        private void setUpActors()
        Creating the player and connecting the player with the inputs (mouse and keyboard). Also sets the camera target to the player.

      • getCamera

        public Camera getCamera()
        Returns:
        current Camera.

      • gameWon

        public void gameWon()
        Called when the game is ended, the game is won by the player.

      • gameLost

        public void gameLost()
        Called when the game is ended, the game is lost by the player.
